p: According to demographic characteristics of study population, total number of cardiovascular disease mortalities in Mashhad was 30121people in 2004–2013 periods that most of them (8585 people) were in the (72–81) age group ( Table 2). In the present study, chi-squared test was used to evaluate the cardiovascular disease mortality rate among women and men. The results showed, maximum mortality has happened among women and men in 72–81 age group ( Fig. 2).
